body_html: Most of the updates are implemented internally and after they are verified, we will push it outside. That will take some time though. We can close this PR for now as the fix is not a real fix but happens to get around some issues in the current implementation. The new implementation should be more robust and easier to debug.

body: Most of the updates are implemented internally and after they are verified, we will push it outside. That will take some time though. We can close this PR for now as the fix is not a real fix but happens to get around some issues in the current implementation. The new implementation should be more robust and easier to debug.
